name: Duc Phong Hotel Hanoi
address: Alley No.20, No,17 Ho Tung Mau, Tu Liem District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Situated in Tu Liem District, Duc Phong Hotel Hanoi is the perfect place to experience Hanoi and its surroundings. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.

Duc Phong Hotel Hanoi offers impeccable service and all the essential amenities to invigorate travelers. For the comfort and convenience of guests, the hotel offers taxi service, airport transfer, elevator.

Guests can choose from 9 rooms, all of which exude an atmosphere of total peace and harmony. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. Discover an engaging blend of professional service and a wide array of features at Duc Phong Hotel Hanoi.

places.name: Benh Vien Da Khoa Y Hoc Co Truyen
